#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
map<string, int> f,g;

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int n,m,i,j;
	cin>>n>>m;
ll a[n+5][m+5],pos;
ll min=1000000007;
ll large=0;
for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
{
	for(j=1;j<=m;j++)
{
	cin>>a[i][j];
}
}
for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
{
	for(j=1;j<=m;j++)
{
if(a[i][j]<min)
min=a[i][j];
//cout<<"min="<<min<<endl;
}

if(min>=large)
{
	large=min;
	pos=i;
//	cout<<"large="<<large;
}
min=1000000007;
}
cout<<large<<endl;





	
	
	
	
return 0;
}
